ST06-001.name: Sakazuki ST06-001
ST06-001.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] ③ You may trash 1 card from your hand: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 0.

ST06-002.name: Koby ST06-002
ST06-002.effect: [On Play] You may trash 1 card from your hand: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 0.

ST06-004.name: Smoker ST06-004
ST06-004.effect: This Character cannot be K.O.'d by effects. [DON!! x1] If there is a Character with a cost of 0, this Character gains [Double Attack].

ST06-005.name: Sengoku ST06-005
ST06-005.effect: [When Attacking] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −4 cost during this turn.

ST06-006.name: Tashigi ST06-006
ST06-006.effect: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2 cost during this turn.

ST06-008.name: Hina ST06-008
ST06-008.effect: [On Play] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −4 cost during this turn.

ST06-010.name: Helmeppo ST06-010
ST06-010.effect: [On Play] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −3 cost during this turn.

ST06-012.name: Monkey D. Garp ST06-012
ST06-012.effect: [Activate: Main] You may trash 1 card from your hand and rest this Character: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

ST06-014.name: Shockwave ST06-014
ST06-014.effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's active Characters with a cost of 3 or less. [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

ST06-015.name: Great Eruption ST06-015
ST06-015.effect: [Main] Draw 1 card. Then, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2 cost during this turn. [Trigger] Your opponent chooses 1 card from their hand and trashes it.

ST06-016.name: White Out ST06-016
ST06-016.effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. [Trigger] Draw 1 card and none of your Characters can be K.O.'d during this turn.

ST06-017.name: Navy HQ ST06-017
ST06-017.effect: [On Play] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −1 cost during this turn. [Activate: Main] You may rest this Stage: If your Leader has the {Navy} type, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −1 cost during this turn.
